TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
Khalkus
I do not need to waste my time fighting Orcs!
I do not need to waste my time fighting Orcs!
I do not need to waste my time fighting Orcs!
I do not need to waste my time fighting Orcs!
Oh, aye. Well we Dwarves have a sayin' that events be like tunnels - they're all connected. Your Undead, my Orcs, all part o' the same big plan, that's what...
Oh, aye. Well we Dwarves have a sayin' that events be like tunnels - they're all connected. Your Undead, my Orcs, all part o' the same big plan, that's what...

Oh, aye. Well we Dwarves have a sayin' that events be like tunnels - they're all connected. Your Undead, my Orcs, all part o' the same big plan, that's what...
Khalkus, that is the stupidest thing I have ever heard.
Khalkus, that is the stupidest thing I have ever heard.
Khalkus, that is the stupidest thing I have ever heard.
Khalkus, that is the stupidest thing I have ever heard.
No, lad, not stupid at all. Just like tunnels, sometimes you canna see how they connect, because the ways in between are so twisty and turny that you...

Enough about the tunnels! I'll fight these Orcs if it will shut you up...
